pullRequest.title: [Feature] Grading statistics
pullRequest.bodyText:
Checklist

 I tested all changes and all related features with different users (student, tutor, instructor, admin) on the test server https://artemistest.ase.in.tum.de.
 Server: I added multiple integration tests (Spring) related to the features (with a high test coverage)
 Server: I documented the Java code using JavaDoc style.
 Client: I documented the TypeScript code using JSDoc style.
 Client: I added multiple screenshots/screencasts of my UI changes
 Client: I translated all the newly inserted strings into German and English

Motivation and Context


Add statistics to the grading page for instructors.
Description

Charts & Statistics

Added a Server REST call to generate the statistics
Added charts for each test case showing the percentage of students that passed the test
Added charts for each sca category showing the amount of issues detected across students
Added charts area next to the datatable

Created a new chart component as a wrapper around the chartjs directive
Added one chart for each table showing different metrics regarding the test cases / sca categories.



Other

Made some implovements to the overall layout of the grading page.
Added '?' icons for the most important columns of the tables.
Included the colors from the charts in the datatable.

Steps for Testing


Create a programming exercise
Particpate in the exercise with multiple accounts and different solutions

Solve different test cases
Solve / Introduce different sca issues


Open the grading page and check the statistics

Tip: All charts have tooltips


Edit the test case and category configuration

The charts should update according to the changes


Save your changes and trigger a rebuild
See the updated results as the students

Test Coverage

Server

ProgrammingExerciseGradingService: 93% stmts
ProgrammingExerciseGradingStatisticsDTR: 86% stmts

Client

programming-exercise-configure-grading.component.ts: 82.35% stmts
sca-category-distribution-chart.component.ts: 89% stmts
test-case-distribution-chart.component.ts: 100% stmts
test-case-passed-builds-chart.component.ts: 100% stmts
category-issues-chart.component.ts: 100% stmts

(More elaborate tests and load tests will be added in a follow-up PR)
Screenshots
